lead_paragraph: The terms of the proposal call for the island’s creditors to exchange the debt they now hold for two new classes of bonds that would delay payments of principal and interest.
snippet: The terms of the proposal call for the island’s creditors to exchange the debt they now hold for two new classes of bonds that would delay payments of principal and interest.

headline.main: Puerto Rico Proposes Plan to Delay Its Debt Payments to Free Up Cash
headline.print_headline: Puerto Rico Proposes Plan to Delay Its Debt Payments to Free Up Cash

abstract: Puerto Rican officials meet with creditors and propose broad program to slow debt payments; delay would give government cash to provide services while it restores economic growth; commonwealth wants to convince Congress of its good intention to pay back debt in hopes of receiving more help from Washington.
